prodNameC: 貝克曼庫爾特浮羅康螢光球
ingredientsDesc: FLOW-COUNT Fluorospheres consists of 10 um (nomial diameter) polystyrene fluorospheres in an aqueous suspension medium containing a surfactant and 1% formaldehyde. Each fluorospheres contains a dye which has a fluorescence emission range of 525 nm to 700 nm when excited at 488 nm. The Assayed Concentration of FLOW-COUNT Fluorospheres is derived from multiple replicate analyses on a COULTER ZBI particles analyzer.
applicantName: 美商貝克曼庫爾特有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區敦化南路二段216號8樓
efficacy: FLOW-COUNT 螢光球是一種螢光球(螢光微球)試劑，當使用EPICS XL流式細胞儀系統配合CYTO-STAT/COULTER CLONE T、B、NK細胞之單株抗體試劑和淋巴細胞亞群單株抗體試劑使用時，可直接用於全血中T、B、NK細胞和淋巴細胞亞群進行絕對計數。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.5220 自動區別細胞計數器

The Assayed Concentration of FLOW-COUNT Fluorospheres is derived from multiple replicate analyses on a COULTER ZBI particles analyzer.
